post.body: actually I still might be able to in a different time zone...ha ha
should've told me...would've DVR'd it here at work and sent out screenshots! :)
sorry about that grant. :(
I'm happy to hear that, too!
same here
Merry Christmas!
ugh...so not exactly fun...just free food and a schpeil on some lukewarm topic....can get that at home watching CSPAN
dude! that stinks!...is it just some lame luncheon type thing?
Then I made sure I got Ops guys way higher on the food chain to join my revolt... :D
true...true...but better than the knucklehead who wanted to do safe-time work this week with a new product...I was all NO WAY!
have at it, girl! I don't mind. I got to babysit someone else's project even though I have my own stuff...so I feel your pain
I gave mine the option of picking up the boys from school or running to walmart for me...he's getting the kids...hee hee
awww...and all that after you gave him props in your post!
nope...staying home for Christmas...but will keep in mind for next flight out of IAD ;)
because it's better than the cellphone waiting area at IAD. :D
oops! ;)
anyone need a 578M image file from the movie Wall-E? I'm thinking by dl'ing it I'll shut down our network for an hour....
nothing like having your hard work marginalized by a moron
Just had an interesting opportunity drop in my lap. Can't wait to pursue it.
almost skipped a conf. call--wished I had now
how hard is it to understand that sending something to me in advance works best for all involved?
just had our potluck and yankee gift exchange--good food and good times! ended up with a cool porcelein travel mug http://is.gd/bP1t
meanwhile...here's some lovely reading material...http://tinyurl.com/6dbxyg
just saw boss' IM to "GO HOME NOW"...won't wait around for her to tell me twice!
Still have a couple days left to help the children at St. Jude Children's Research Hospital: http://is.gd/boFn
Guess it's time to update WordPress when I can't upload an image in IE or Firefox...
cannot believe it is only 3:35pm...come on, weekend!
I'll bet his parents are so proud http://tinyurl.com/5cfakh
wondering how co-worker manages to have 2-hour lunches on a near-daily basis...
wonder if anyone will notice if I lay down under my desk for a nap
16-month old figured out how to make "fish face" but sounds like a pig while doing it.
Merry Christmas, everyone!!!!
tearing out of here...
And now he's back & yelling over the phone to someone that I can actually hear as well. Good times.
wondering why officemate bothered driving all the way in today when he's spent 90% of his time out of the building
Dear Sir or Madam, I actually have real work to do besides babysitting your mess that you pathetically project-managed into the ground.
Help @RockinPRGirl raise money for The Salvation Army by Dec. 24. Just need $105 to reach her goal. http://snipr.com/91gqs (Please RT)!
...McDonald's lattes will get me through this recession!
Dear, Lovely, Yummy Starbucks. I love you, but I have found a mistress that will not cost me as much...
Just an FYI: that dent in my forehead is from smashing it repeatedly on my desk from dealing with idiots.
